p: To confirm these results we infected 1869 flies from 32 inbred D. melanogaster lines ( Mackay et al., 2012) that had known CHKov1 or p62 genotypes. The effect of these genes was greater on the naturally occurring virus than the viruses from other species ( Figure 3; effect of genotype on DMelSV load: F 2,28 = 13.2, p=0.00001; DAffSV: F 2,29 = 4.9, p=0.01; DObsSV: F 2,29 = 5.7, p=0.01).
